text: Yes, similar to the ability to hide sizing controls for images
I would really like this to change! it takes a full 5 mins just to add (in my opinion) a ‘single field’ that should take 5 seconds.

also if you want 2 forms in you’re module the code in the documentation doesn’t work as the form_key=‘{{ name }}’ would get used twice
The table of field types doesn’t mention this field…
